entry.def: If you sterilize a thing or a place, you make it completely clean and free from germs.

example.ex: Sulphur is also used to sterilize equipment...
example.tran: 硫也可用来给器材消毒。

example.ex: The milk was sterilized and sealed in bottles.
example.tran: 牛奶经过灭菌处理后被封装在瓶子里。

entry.def: If a person or an animal is sterilized, they have a medical operation that makes it impossible for them to have or produce babies.

example.ex: My wife was sterilized after the birth of her fourth child.
example.tran: 我妻子生完第4个孩子后做了绝育手术。

sentences.sentence: "in some countries, people with genetically transmissible disbilites are sterilized"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ad加强[有"向"之意+vert转+ize……化,做等→使转向→[做广告]使其注意……
ag一再+grand大+ize……化,做等→一再大→扩大[权力]等
civil公民的+ize……化,做等→v.使开化,使文明,教化
critic批评家+ize……化,做等→v.[criticise]批评,评论
ex出+orc巫术,邪魔+ize……化,做等→v.驱魔,去除[坏念头等]
fertile肥沃的+ize表动词→v.使受精;施肥于,使肥沃
general总的,大体的+ize……化,做等→v.归纳,概括,推广,普及
lion狮子+ize……化,做等→把人当狮子一样看→崇拜
material物质+ize……化,做等→v.赋予形体,实现
neutral中间的,中和的+ize……化,做等→v.使无效,中和
popular流行的+ize…化,使…→v.[使]大众化,[使]普及,推广
public公众的+ize……化,做等→v.宣传,引人注意

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使复活,使重新充满活力

steril无菌的+ize……化,做等→v.使不育,杀菌
tempor时间+ize……化→时间化→拖延时间

sentences.en: Antiseptic is used to sterilize the skin before giving an injection.
sentences.cn: 杀菌剂被用于在注射前给皮肤消毒。

sentences.en: All surgical instruments must be sterilized before use.
sentences.cn: 所有的外科手术器械在使用之前,必须消毒。

sentences.en: All the glasses should be washed out and sterilized.
sentences.cn: 所有的杯子都应该洗干净并且消毒。

means.word_mean: 使失去生育能力;使绝育

sentences.en: sterilize animals so that they cannot reproduce
sentences.cn: 把畜生阉过，就不会再生育了
